bill.title: Interisland High Voltage Electric Transmission Cable System
bill.description: Establishes a regulatory structure for the installation and implementation of an interisland high voltage electric transmission cable system and for the construction of on-island transmission infrastructure. Effective July 1, 2030. (SB367 HD2)

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to ENE.
(S) The committee(s) on ENE will hold a public decision making on 02-03-10 3:25PM in conference room 225.

(S) The committee(s) on ENE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS and be recommitted. The votes in ENE were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Gabbard, Ihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) English, Green.
(S) Reported from ENE (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 19) as amended (SD 1), with recommendation of recommittal to ENE.
(S) Report adopted, as amended (SD 1) and recommitted to ENE.
(S) Re-Referred to ENE/CPN, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on ENE/CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 02-10-11 3:10PM in conference room 225.
(S) The committee(s) on ENE/CPN deferred the measure until 02-15-11 3:00PM in conference room 225.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Green; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Baker, Galuteria ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Taniguchi, Nishihara, Solomon.

(S) The committee(s) on ENE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in ENE were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Gabbard, Green; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) English ; 2 No(es): Senator(s) Ihara, Slom; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reported from ENE/CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 336) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 2) and referral to WAM.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-25-11 9:00AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Espero, Kahele, Kim, Tokuda, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) English, Fukunaga, Ryan ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Kouchi.

(H) Proposed draft of Bill scheduled to be heard by EEP/CPC on Monday, 03-21-11 2:30PM in House conference room 325.

The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Coffman, Cabanilla, Herkes, Ito, Nakashima; Ayes with reservations: none; 2 Noes: Representative(s) Riviere, Thielen; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Chang, Chong, Har.

Oshiro, Tsuji, Marumoto; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Keith-Agaran, Souki, Ching; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Thielen; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Brower, Carroll, McKelvey.
